text: Glenn Ljungström was the guitarist of the Swedish melodic death metal band In Flames with Jesper Strömblad. He was a member of In Flames from 1993 until 1997, when he quit to find another job. Glenn was also a guitarist of the Swedish power metal band HammerFall from 1995 until 1997. == Album appearances == === In Flames === * Lunar Strain (1994) * Subterranean (1995, EP) * The Jester Race (1996) * Black-Ash Inheritance (1997, EP) * Whoracle (1997) === HammerFall === * Glory to the Brave (1997) === Dimension Zero === * Penetrations from the Lost World (1997, EP) * Silent Night Fever (2001) * This Is Hell (2003) * He Who Shall Not Bleed (2008) Category:1974 births Category:Living people Category:Swedish heavy metal guitarists Category:Musicians from Gothenburg
title: Glenn Ljungström
